name: Light Cycles
description:
Light Cycles is a game about outmanoeuvring your opponent on high speed light cycles to make them crash. As the match goes on though, your bike will speed up involuntarily until only those with the fastest reflexes will be victorious.

The game has a singleplayer AI but also supports LAN and local multiplayer as well.

Controls:

Left or A: Turn Left

Right or D: Turn Right

Up or W: Accelerate

There are no brakes, this game only gets faster!

Developed by Aiden George - @clabbaged
